page.title: 02Faxton Grange Farm,Old
page.content:
The farm is about 330 acres.It is an {arable/livestock}farm,with 240 acres of arable crops and 90 acres of grass. The grass supports 140 ewes (which produced 260 lambs in 1985) and 80 cattle.
The arable crops grown are corn,barley,beans and oil seed rape (grown for the first time this year).
The owner has worked the farm for 33 years.He has 1 man working for him. They have 7 tractors and 1 combine harvester.The machinery helps them alot but the owner still has to work very long hours,12 hours a day being normal.
